text:
If you've
distributed the MS Printer Metadata Troubleshooter Tool you will want to patch
or remove it.
https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmsrc.microsoft.com%2Fupdate-guide%2Fvulnerability%2FCVE-2024-21325&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C2234976895e6430d3f1008dc1148b6e1%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638404251602005554%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C62000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=%2FO7tLCN%2Ffl1mWVmpwd60TqSEIjRdfJ7zPgYb3EAwC9E%3D&reserved=0

metadata.topic: Microsoft Printer Metadata Troubleshooter Tool Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] Microsoft Printer Metadata Troubleshooter Tool Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
metadata.email_text_original:
[You don't often get email from patchmanagement.org@12pd.com. Learn why this is
important at https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification ] If you've
distributed the MS Printer Metadata Troubleshooter Tool you will want to patch
or remove it.
https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmsrc.microsoft.com%2Fupdate-guide%2Fvulnerability%2FCVE-2024-21325&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C2234976895e6430d3f1008dc1148b6e1%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638404251602005554%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C62000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=%2FO7tLCN%2Ffl1mWVmpwd60TqSEIjRdfJ7zPgYb3EAwC9E%3D&reserved=0
-S --
Link: None
